Pre-Game Insights: Team India is on the top of the ICC T20 Group 2 points table with 4 points after winning two matches against Pakistan and the Netherlands. They are set to play against South Africa on 30 October 2022.
The match is the third game for India in the tournament and follows their wins against Pakistan and the Netherlands.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match will be played at Optus Stadium, formerly known as the Perth Stadium in western Australia.
The live telecast will be available on Star Sports Network and can be streamed on the Disney+ Hotstar app.
Others: The teams' squads include several key players from both sides, with India featuring KL Rahul, Rohit Sharma, and Virat Kohli, and South Africa featuring Quinton de Kock and David Miller.
